metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13135 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A NULL Pointer Dereference exists in VideoLAN x265, as used in libbpg 0.9.7 and other products, because the CUData::initialize function in common/cudata.cpp mishandles memory-allocation failure. It was discovered that VideoLAN x265 mishandled certain memory-allocation failures. An attacker could use this vulnerability to cause a denial of service (crash)

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13135` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libx265-79 - 1.9-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
x265 - 1.9-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: x265 package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9-3ubuntu0.1~esm1').
